overview:
CTO and Co-Founder of Zenanny, website: http://www.zenanny.com

I am an experienced and technically-focused manager and had the chance to manage differents systems environments (startups, big societies like AFP, etc) , with a comprehensive understanding of all common Internet technologies and operations.

I have an excellent understanding of other business areas, including sales, support, provisioning, procurement, billing and budgeting, and their interaction with technical disciplines.

Highly skilled and experienced in administration of Internet services running on Linux, I have great knowledge about load balancing and high availability.
